errors.error_description: Version compatibility error - claims Python 3.8+ and Django 2.2 but changelog shows only Django 1.10 support
correction_candidates: Change to Python 2.7+ and Django 1.8-1.10 to match the changelog
Update to Python 3.6+ and Django 1.10+ based on actual compatibility
Specify Python 2.7/3.x and Django 1.6+ for broader compatibility
Remove version specifications and refer to setup.py for requirements
errors.golden_answer: Change to Python 2.7+ and Django 1.8-1.10 to match the changelog
